TopicTitle: Pre Launch Throttle Setting Reset When Descending

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.5 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 11 | CPU: 7950X3D | GPU: 7900XTX | RAM: 64GB DDR5 6000

 

As a player is descending to KSC after a launch in an RTLS scenario (I.E. flying back a Falcon 9 style first stage) the throttle will automatically set itself to the prelaunch state that can be set by the player in the settings. It happens at 20km above sea level when coming in from high altitudes, although if a player crosses into space (70km ASL) this does not occur.

It can be mitigated by the user by setting prelaunch throttle to 0% in settings, and does not seem to be an issue when launching, only when coming back towards KSC.

Edited October 28, 2023 by The Space Peacock
